{{about|Indonesian version of VH1|VH1 in other countries in Asia Pacific|MTV Networks Asia Pacific|original VH1|VH1}} {{Infobox TV channel | name = VH1 | logofile = | logosize = | logoalt = | launch = {{start date|2005|1|1}} | owner = [[Media Nusantara Citra]] (50%)
[[MTV Networks Asia Pacific]] (50%) | country = [[Indonesia]] | broadcast area = Indonesia | headquarters = Jakarta, Indonesia | Slogan = VH1 Loves Pedestrian | Language = [[Bahasa Indonesia]], [[English]] | sister names = [[MTV Indonesia]], [[Nickelodeon Indonesia]] | web = [http://www.mtvasia.com www.mtvasia.com] | terr serv 1 = [[Jak TV]]Jakarta, [[TA TV]]Surakarta & Yogyakarta, [[Borobudur TV]] Semarang, [[STV (Indonesia)|STV]] Bandung, [[Makassar TV]] Makassar | terr chan 1 = | sat serv 1 = | sat chan 1 = | cable serv 1 = [[MNC Music Channel]] / [[Indovison]] (Indonesia) | cable chan 1 = Channel 60 | sat radio serv 1 = | sat radio chan 1 = | adsl serv 1 = | adsl chan 1 = | online serv 1 = | online chan 1 = | 3gmobile serv 1 = }} '''VH1 Indonesia''' or simply '''VH1''' is a television channel broadcast nationality in [[Indonesia]]. A spin-off of [[MTV Indonesia]], this program is focused on local and international music. It is a joint venture between [[MTV Networks Asia Pacific]] and [[Media Nusantara Citra]]. Most of the programs are usually VH1 ''The Best Mix'', and ''VH1 Time Machine''. It is an Indonesian version of the original [[VH1]]. ==History== In the beginning VH1 indonesia is parts of [[MTV Indonesia]] but they separated and now VH1 Indonesia aired itself. ==Comparison with MTV Indonesia== Compared to MTV Indonesia, VH1 Indonesia focused on VH1 branding. It rarely broadcast Oriental music, although MTV Indonesia did occasionally. It also does not have its programming block on [[RCTI]], [[TPI (Indonesia)|TPI]] and [[Global TV (Indonesia)|Global TV]] either. Instead, it broadcast on some local stations, depending on what time it was shown. VH1 also does not air as a programming block on [[MNC Music Channel]] and [[MNC The Indonesian Channel]]. ==Targeting== VH1 Indonesia is targeted to all ages, especially adult , unlike MTV Indonesia, which is targeted always to teenagers ==Shows available== {{see |List of programs broadcast by VH1}} ==Stations that show VH1== VH1 is available in: * [[Jak-TV]] in [[Jakarta]] * [[STV (Indonesia)|STV]] in [[Bandung]] * [[TV Borobudur]] in [[Semarang]] * [[TATV]] in Solo * [[Makassar TV]] in [[Makassar]]. ==See also== * [[MTV Indonesia]] * [[MTV Networks Asia Pacific]] ==External links== * [http://www.globalpolicy.org/globaliz/cultural/2003/0812mtv.htm MTV Asia's History Site] * [http://www.mtvasia.com/ MTV Asia website] {{Viacom}} {{MTV Networks}} [[Category:Television stations in Indonesia]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2005]] [[id:VH1 Indonesia]] [[pt:VH1 IndonÃ©sia]]
